query.default: select doc.id as DocumentId, doc.created as DateCreated, empl.name as AutorDocument, doc.name as DocumentName, kind.name as KindDocument, doc.regnumber_docflow_sungero as RegNumber from sungero_content_edoc doc join sungero_core_recipient empl on doc.author = empl.Id join sungero_docflow_documentkind kind on doc.documentkind_docflow_sungero = kind.Id where author = @EmployeeId and doc.created >= @DateStart and doc.created <= @DateEnd order by created desc
